Instructions

Instructions: Please report total number of actual and potential SIF Events that occurred in calendar year 20XX. Please break out your reported numbers by IOGP Life Saving Rule categories.
SIF Events

Total
Please provide details for any SIF events not assigned to a life-saving rule ("Other").
Additional Instructions:
For all actual SIFs reported above, please submit a SIF Incident Report for each incident. For the potential SIFs reported above, you may select up to 5 Potential SIF events with the most learning opportunity for the industry and provide additional detailed information for each incident by completing a SIR Incident Report for each incident.

Report Form 5

Schematics / Photographs – OPTIONAL (Stolen from IOGP)

Images can be submitted to support the incident report. Images must be submitted separately as individual files along with this document. Acceptable image types are .jpeg, .jpg, .gif and .png and they must be less than 500KB in size.
+Add a File
Save

The Onshore Safety Alliance (OSA) is a vluntary indsutry program seeking to drive step-change to eliminate serious injury and fatality (SIF) events in U.S. onshore E&P operations. The program is available including operators, contractors, and service providers.
